p: Given that spatial autocorrelation was performed for most OLS regression models (i.e., p < 0.05, Moranâ€™s test), we next considered a SEVM modeling approach to remove spatial autocorrelation in the regression residuals [ 31, 57, 58]. Specifically, we adopted the Moran eigenvector approach using the function SpatialFiltering in the R package spdep. As with the OLS regression analyses, we constructed full models and then selected the best model based on AICc values. The spatial filter was fixed in the model-selection procedures [ 57]. We also obtained the averaged models, and estimated the relative importance of each explanatory variable in the SEVM modeling. The residuals of the explanatory variables and network parameters were calculated according to the SEVM modeling approach-based best models.
